quotes.quote: I thought I was so ugly for so long, and I wasted so much of my life on this dumb notion.
Never pick a fight with an ugly person, they've got nothing to lose.
Ugly people kill people all the time. But when pretty people did, it got attention.
Every man is handsome, every woman is beautiful. Hardships make us ugly.
Beauty is variable, ugliness is constant.
I might be ugly, but my cars are real pretty.
The potential beauty of human life is constantly made ugly by man's ever-recurring song of retaliation.
An ugly diamond is still worth more than a beautiful pebble.
Alcohol does not make ugly people attractive. It makes it so you could care less that they're ugly.
The beautiful has but one type, the ugly has a thousand.
I just do art because I'm ugly and there's nothing else for me to do.
Never insult those who are Poor or Ugly,They are the reason YOU look rich and good!
People who say you are ugly, may be true, because to them, you look like a monster. People who say you are beautiful, may also be true, because to them, you look like an angel.
No matter how ugly you are; there is always someone who sees his heaven in your eyes.
The ugly can be beautiful. The pretty, never.
My body is an ugly masterpiece that lives off the beauty of sound.
I would not have had that happen to you. Discourtesy is unspeakably ugly to me.
She may have a weight problem but you have an ugly problem.
Ugly is a word that should only be used to describe sin and never used to describe people.
He's so ugly he should have to wear an oxygen mask.
When I was born I was so ugly the doctor slapped my mother.
In an ugly and unhappy world the richest man can purchase nothing but ugliness and unhappiness.
The beauty on the inside, will determine the ugly on the outside.
What ever beauty may be it has for its basis order and for its essence unity Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone.
He used to say the uglier things are the longer they live, and the ugliest things live forever.
There is nothing ugly; I never saw an ugly thing in my life; for let the form of an object be what it may,—light, shade, and perspective will always make it beautiful.
Those who find ugly meanings in beautiful things are corrupt without being charming. This is a fault. Those who find beautiful meanings in the beautiful things are the cultivated.
When you're called a character actress it's because you're too ugly to be called a leading lady.
Don't worry. The ugly duckling always grows into a beautiful swan.
Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly is to the bones. When beauty has gone, ugly lingers on.
